summary: Senior network engineer and automation specialist with 10 years building and securing service-provider and enterprise networks. Blend Juniper and Cisco expertise with Python and Ansible pipelines that deliver pre-checks, canary releases, auto-rollback, and observability guardrails. Seeking defensive cyber roles where EVPN-VXLAN segmentation, NGFW/IPS, and infrastructure-as-code improve reliability, security, and mission resilience.
skills:
Service-provider networking: Juniper MX/SRX, Nokia OLT/BNG, GPON/XGSPON, DWDM, SONET
Cisco engineering: ACI underlay and overlay, Catalyst, Nexus, ASR 9000, IOS
Automation and tooling: Python (PyATS, Netmiko, Paramiko, ixnetwork_restpy), Git, CI/CD, REST/JSON/XML/YAML, basic Ansible
Routing and switching: BGP, OSPF, MPLS, LDP, VXLAN/EVPN, HSRP/GLBP, PIMv2, IGMP
Security and VPN: IPsec, RADIUS, TACACS+, NGFW/IPS lab exposure (Palo Alto, F5 BIG-IP)
Observability and documentation: SolarWinds, SevOne, Splunk, automated Visio builds, standards authorship
Cloud fundamentals: Coursework and labs across AWS, Azure, and GCP networking
education: Associate of Applied Science, Information Technology (Network Specialist) — Madison Area Technical College — 2015
certifications:
Cisco Certified Network Professional Routing and Switching (CCNP-RS) — Issued 2016, expired 2022
Juniper Networks Certified Internet Professional Service Provider (JNCIP-SP) — Issued 2019, expired 2022 — Completed prerequisites and sat for JNCIE-SP

experiences.title: QA Automation Software Engineer (Networking)
experiences.summary: Contracted via Insight Global to harden Google Fiber lab networks with PyATS-driven validation and Python automation.
bullets: Built PyATS-based automation that validates FTTH lab environments spanning Juniper MX/SRX, Nokia OLT/BNG, GPON, and XGSPON platforms.
Developed Python tooling using ixnetwork_restpy, Polatis SCPI, Netmiko, Paramiko, XML, JSON, and YAML to drive pre-flight checks and regression suites.
Established GitHub workflows with pull requests, branching policies, and Jira integration; coached peers on rebasing, merging, and code review hygiene.
Delivered recurring slide reviews and live demos via Google Meet, translating complex lab results into actionable decisions.

experiences.title: Network Engineer III
experiences.summary: Supported AWS datacenter turn-ups through automation-first network engineering while contracted via Apex Systems.
bullets: Gathered, validated, and published configuration data into AWS version-control repositories to support hyperscale datacenter turn-ups.
Configured Linux hosts and Juniper TOR switches using Python-driven automation aligned with DevOps practices.
Diagnosed routing and optical issues by applying expertise in BGP, OSPF, DWDM, and SONET to maintain availability targets.

experiences.title: Network Administrator
experiences.summary: Contracted via Hays to maintain Arm's global network operations and stand up internal Cisco ACI lab infrastructure.
bullets: Racked, stacked, and configured an internal Cisco ACI lab while documenting the build and earning 40 Cisco continuing education credits.
Maintained monitoring, runbooks, and configuration hygiene across a follow-the-sun operations model.
Partnered with global peers to resolve incidents quickly and keep business-critical services stable.

experiences.title: Senior Network Engineer
experiences.summary: Contracted via Mainz Brady Group to modernize supercomputer management networks and ship automation at scale.
bullets: Redesigned management network topologies to eliminate spanning-tree loops and advocated for Clos architectures supporting Cray Shasta systems.
Authored Python tooling to generate configurations from spreadsheets, reducing deployment effort across multiple supercomputer families.
Guided stakeholders through architecture choices, capacity planning, and resiliency strategies using Git, Bitbucket, and GitHub collaboration.
Engineered temporary resource-sharing overlays that kept R&D teams productive despite global supply constraints.

experiences.title: Network Developer II
experiences.summary: Delivered automation for Blue Planet MDSO and bridged agile software practices with network engineering teams.
bullets: Built CI/CD pipelines and automation for Blue Planet MDSO to enable zero-touch service lifecycle orchestration.
Added Cisco ASR 9000 automation features and Python-based telemetry collection to cut troubleshooting time.
Operated within full agile cadences, aligning sprints, standups, demos, and retrospectives between engineering groups.

experiences.title: Network Engineer II
experiences.summary: Led infrastructure planning and training for Metro Ethernet Forum services across Spectrum Enterprise.
bullets: Planned, designed, and deployed network infrastructure while leading troubleshooting for complex Metro Ethernet services.
Hardened Cisco ACS command restrictions, preventing outages tied to switchport trunk misconfigurations.
Trained and mentored 20 engineers on advanced routing, TACACS failover, and packet analysis.
Co-developed JavaScript-based configuration forms and Git workflows that improved configuration accuracy.

experiences.title: Network Specialist I
experiences.summary: Automated documentation and recovery workflows for Charter's high-availability network infrastructure.
bullets: Created Python automation to generate Visio diagrams and enable TACACS on CPE, reducing manual effort from hours to minutes.
Led field technicians through RFC 2544 testing, failover drills, and recovery of a core router supporting government networks.
Partnered with principal engineers on MP-BGP, MPLS, QoS, IS-IS, and OSPF initiatives, including provider-edge router turn-ups.

extras:
Projects — juggling_coach: Python video-analysis toolkit that applies the Claude Shannon juggling theorem to deliver actionable feedback (CLI, demo video).
Projects — Austin Events Today: Web-scraping utility that reorders local events chronologically; documented via educational YouTube content.
Projects — TechYes Public Learning Channel: Produced nearly 1,000 videos on networking, Python, AI tooling, and mindfulness-based stress reduction.
Community — Mentor, Agile Learning Institute (2023-present): Provide pro bono coaching for underrepresented software engineers.
Community — Juggler, Texas Juggling Society (2017-present): Perform at community events to fund a free and open juggling collective in Austin, TX.
Honors — Charter Achievement Award (2018): Recognized for Python automation that secured 25,000 CPE devices and prevented trunking outages.
Honors — International Jugglers Association Numbers Medals: Multiple awards for 10-club passing performances.
Market Fit — Defensive cybersecurity and network automation engineer focused on EVPN-VXLAN, NGFW/IPS, IaC, and STIG-aligned automation for contested environments.
